name: StairwayToH
description:
Global Game Jam 2016 game.

A high concept corpse consuming meditative experience with the dulcet midi tones of Stairway to Heaven.

Use WASD to move shoot with left click, play Stairway with right click. Kill enemies, eat their corpses by walking over them to heal play stairway to win.

Shooting takes life, playing stairway takes life, eating the dead enemies heals you must manage shooting, eating, and playing to survive. The enemies spawn faster as time goes on good luck! It is beatable I promise.
